data.text: @DutchHockeyMom 😂😂..these kids may have more of a future than I had thought!

@DutchHockeyMom My kids refused to touch them, the office asked why. My kids explained that the test is flawed and they should throw them in the garbage. The staff said fair enough and dropped it. Maybe we are making progress
@DutchHockeyMom Could they not have made them from drink box water bottle sorta things? Idiots!
@DutchHockeyMom Can't wait to see Antigen Test Island floating out on the ocean....
2/2 What a great use of our tax dollars @adriandix !!  An attempt to fuel the flame of fear has actually backfired!  Teenagers know this is all a joke… and they have all along!
